name: Bundobust - Manchester Piccadilly
times: Monday 12-10:30 pm, Tuesday 12-10:30 pm, Wednesday 12-10:30 pm, Thursday 12-10:30 pm, Friday 12-11 pm, Saturday, 12-11 pm, Sunday 12-9 pm
summary: Bundobust Manchester is a popular vegetarian and vegan restaurant offering an exciting menu of Indian street food with a modern twist. Located in the heart of Manchester near Piccadilly Gardens, Bundobust is a go-to destination for vegan and vegetarian dining, serving flavour-packed dishes such as okra fries, bhel puri, and vegan vada pav. The menu is designed to cater to both plant-based and vegetarian diets, with plenty of vegan options available. Pair your meal with craft beers brewed locally and in-house for a truly unique experience. With its laid-back canteen-style setting and commitment to serving fresh, creative food, Bundobust is one of the best vegan and vegetarian restaurants in Manchester for those seeking delicious, sustainable dining.

name: Bhaji Pala
address: 2 Old Hall Rd, Gatley, Cheadle SK8 4BE
times: Monday 4-10 pm, Tuesday 4-10 pm, Wednesday 4-10 pm, Thursday 4-10 pm, Friday 4-11 pm, Saturday 4-11 pm, Sunday 12-9 pm
summary: Bhaji Pala is Greater Manchester's first fully vegan Indian restaurant, offering an authentic taste of Western Indian cuisine in the heart of Gatley, Cheadle. The name 'Bhaji Pala,' derived from Marathi, translates to 'green veggies and herbs,' which are central to the vegetarian cooking traditions of Maharashtra, Rajasthan, Gujarat, and Goa. The restaurant's menu features a diverse array of dishes, including Tandoori Broccoli, Jackfruit Tandoor, and Indo-Chinese options like Tofu Mushroom Chilli, all crafted with plant-based ingredients to deliver rich, complex flavors. Bhaji Pala has garnered acclaim for its innovative approach to vegan dining, offering a unique and flavorful experience for vegans, vegetarians, and anyone seeking authentic Indian cuisine.
